00288 template <class T>
00289 struct BinaryTree<T>::node
00290 {
00291     unsigned height; // Height of the subtree
00292     node* left;      // Left subtree root
00293     node* right;     // Right subtree root
00294     T data;          // Data contained in the node
00295     node(T d)        // Constructor got struct
00296     {
00297         data = d;
00298         left = NULL;
00299         right = NULL;
00300         height = 1;
00301     }
00302 };
00303 
00304 template <class T>
00305 BinaryTree<T>::BinaryTree()
00306 {
00307     root = NULL;
00308 }
00309 
00310 //****************************************************************************
00311 //                   DESTRUCTOR AND HELPER                                   *
00312 //****************************************************************************
00313 
00314 template <class T>
00315 BinaryTree<T>::~BinaryTree()
00316 {
00317     Clear(root);
00318 }
00319 
00320 template <class T>
00321 void BinaryTree<T>::Clear(node * parent)
00322 {
00323     if(parent != NULL)
00324     {
00325         Clear(parent -> left); // Clears all leaves left of a root
00326         Clear(parent -> right); // Clears all leaves right of a root
00327         delete parent; // delete parent node
00328         parent = NULL; // no dangling pointer
00329     }
00330 }

00334 //****************************************************************************
00335 
00336 template <class T>
00337 BinaryTree<T>::BinaryTree(const BinaryTree & rhs)
00338 {
00339     root = Copy(rhs.root);
00340 }
00341 
00342 template <class T>
00343 typename BinaryTree<T>::node * BinaryTree<T>::Copy(const node * parent)
00344 {
00345     if(parent == NULL)
00346     {
00347         return NULL;
00348     }
00349 
00350     node *newNode;
00351     newNode = new node(parent -> data);
00352 
00353     newNode -> right = NULL;
00354     newNode -> left  = NULL;
00355 
00356     newNode -> right = Copy(parent -> right);
00357     newNode -> left  = Copy(parent -> left);
00358 
00359     return newNode;
00360 }
00361 
00362 template <class T>
00363 BinaryTree<T> BinaryTree<T>::operator = (const BinaryTree & rhs)
00364 {
00365     BinaryTree newBT(rhs);
00366     return newBT;
00367 }

00369 //****************************************************************************
00370 //                  INSERTING INTO THE BINARY TREE                           *
00371 //****************************************************************************
00372 
00373 template <class T>
00374 void BinaryTree<T>::Insert(T newData)
00375 {
00376     root = Insert(newData, root);
00377 }
00378 
00379 template <class T>
00380 typename BinaryTree<T>::node * BinaryTree<T>::Insert(T newData, node * parent)
00381 {
00382     if(parent == NULL)
00383         return new node(newData);
00384 
00385     if(newData < parent -> data)
00386         parent -> left = Insert(newData, parent -> left);
00387     else if(parent -> data < newData)
00388         parent -> right = Insert(newData, parent -> right);
00389 
00390     return Balance(parent);
00391 }
00392 
00393 //****************************************************************************
00394 //                        ROTATING THE BINARYTREE                            *
00395 //****************************************************************************
00396 
00397 template <class T>
00398 typename BinaryTree<T>::node * BinaryTree<T>::Balance(node * parent)
00399 {
00400     FixHeight(parent);
00401 
00402     if(BalanceDifference(parent) == 2)
00403     {
00404         if(BalanceDifference(parent -> right) < 0)
00405             parent -> right = RotateRight( parent -> right );
00406         return RotateLeft(parent);
00407     }
00408 
00409     if(BalanceDifference(parent) == -2)
00410     {
00411         if(BalanceDifference(parent -> left) > 0)
00412             parent -> left = RotateLeft( parent -> left );
00413         return RotateRight(parent);
00414     }
00415 
00416     return parent;
00417 }
00418 
00419 template <class T>
00420 typename BinaryTree<T>::node * BinaryTree<T>::RotateRight(node * parent)
00421 {
00422         node * y = parent -> left;
00423         parent -> left = y -> right;
00424         y -> right = parent;
00425 
00426         FixHeight(parent);
00427         FixHeight(y);
00428 
00429         return y;
00430 }
00431 
00432 template <class T>
00433 typename BinaryTree<T>::node * BinaryTree<T>::RotateLeft(node * parent)
00434 {
00435         node * x = parent -> right;
00436         parent -> right = x -> left;
00437         x -> left = parent;
00438 
00439         FixHeight(parent);
00440         FixHeight(x);
00441 
00442         return x;
00443 }
00444 
00445 //****************************************************************************
00446 //                      HEIGHT FUNCTIONS                                     *
00447 //****************************************************************************
00448 
00449 // Can operate on empty (empty BinaryTrees)
00450 template <class T>
00451 unsigned BinaryTree<T>::Height(node * parent)
00452 {
00453     // If parent == NULL, return zero else return height
00454         return parent ? parent -> height:0;
00455 }
00456 
00457 // Calculates balance factor, works with non zero only
00458 template <class T>
00459 int BinaryTree<T>::BalanceDifference(node * parent)
00460 {
00461         return Height(parent -> right) - Height(parent -> left);
00462 }
00463 
00464 // Retrieves the correct value for the height field
00465 template <class T>
00466 void BinaryTree<T>::FixHeight(node * parent)
00467 {
00468         unsigned hl = Height(parent -> left);
00469         unsigned hr = Height(parent -> right);
00470 
00471         if(hl > hr)
00472         parent -> height = hl + 1;
00473     else
00474         parent -> height = hr + 1;
00475 }

00477 //****************************************************************************
00478 //                  IN ORDER PROCESSING                                      *
00479 //****************************************************************************
00480 
00481 template <class T>
00482 void BinaryTree<T>::InOrder(void(*travFunc)(const T & data))
00483 {
00484     InOrderHelper(root, travFunc);
00485 }
00486 
00487 template <class T>
00488 void BinaryTree<T>::InOrderHelper(node *& parent, void(*travFunc)(const T & data))
00489 {
00490     if(parent != NULL)
00491     {
00492         InOrderHelper(parent -> left, travFunc);
00493         travFunc(parent -> data);
00494         InOrderHelper(parent -> right, travFunc);
00495     }
00496 }
00497 
00498 //****************************************************************************
00499 //                  PRE ORDER PROCESSING                                     *
00500 //****************************************************************************
00501 
00502 template <class T>
00503 void BinaryTree<T>::PreOrder(void(*travFunc)(const T & data))
00504 {
00505     PreOrderHelper(root, travFunc);
00506 }
00507 
00508 template <class T>
00509 void BinaryTree<T>::PreOrderHelper(node *& parent, void(*travFunc)(const T & data))
00510 {
00511     if(parent != NULL)
00512     {
00513         travFunc(parent -> data);
00514         PreOrderHelper(parent -> left, travFunc);
00515         PreOrderHelper(parent -> right, travFunc);
00516     }
00517 }
00518 
00519 //****************************************************************************
00520 //                  POST ORDER PROCESSING                                    *
00521 //****************************************************************************
00522 
00523 template <class T>
00524 void BinaryTree<T>::PostOrder(void(*travFunc)(const T & data))
00525 {
00526     PostOrderHelper(root, travFunc);
00527 }
00528 
00529 template <class T>
00530 void BinaryTree<T>::PostOrderHelper(node *& parent, void(*travFunc)(const T & data))
00531 {
00532     if(parent != NULL)
00533     {
00534         PostOrderHelper(parent -> left, travFunc);
00535         PostOrderHelper(parent -> right, travFunc);
00536         travFunc(parent -> data);
00537     }
00538 }
00539 
00540 //****************************************************************************
00541 //                          SEARCH FUNCTION                                  *
00542 //****************************************************************************
00543 
00544 template <class T>
00545 bool BinaryTree<T>::Search(T key ,void(*searchFunc)(const T & data))
00546 {
00547     bool found;
00548     found = SearchHelper(key, root, searchFunc);
00549 
00550     return found;
00551 }
00552 
00553 template<class T>
00554 bool BinaryTree<T>::SearchHelper(T key, node *& parent, void(*searchFunc)(const T & data))
00555 {
00556     if(parent != NULL)
00557     {
00558         if(key == parent -> data)
00559         {
00560             searchFunc(parent -> data);
00561             return true;
00562         }
00563 
00564         if(key < parent -> data)
00565         {
00566             return SearchHelper(key, parent -> left, searchFunc);
00567         }
00568         else
00569         {
00570             return SearchHelper(key, parent -> right, searchFunc);
00571         }
00572     }
00573 
00574     return false;
00575 }
